Hirotada Tokugawa translated something interesting from the b=
ook

AS ALWAYS WE TAKE SUBMISSIONS---thi=
s little skit was a series of
soundclips recorded separately and pasted tog=
ether so if you have
online friends living several states away or in anothe=
r country you
can in fact make your OWN Shinsengumi audio skit! And submit =
it as an
mp3 or wav file.

For example a spoof on Star Wars... "HAN WARS"

"

Darth Vader "No I am really your th=
ird cousin, secretly adopted into

r "That's not important---the point is we will destroy the

How to speculate like a professional fangirl

Question: "What are =
the details of Fujita Goro and Shinoda Yaso's
divorce?"

a) Yaso divorced G=
oro
b) Goro divorced Yaso
c) they divorced *each *other (like millions of p=
eople all over the
world) because they couldn't get along
d) there was a va=
st Aizu conspiracy to destroy the couple and match
Goro with Tokio, even th=
ough the domain had nothing to gain from such
a marriage 
e) we don't reall=
y know

e) is correct 

but you can LEARN MORE YOURSELF by looking at the S=
AITOU HAJIME
TRANSLATIONS right here at our mailing list "FILES" download a=
ll the
docs and read it carefully.  The translations are from a Japanese
we=
bsite---this website was chosen specifically because she used the
texts ava=
ilable regarding Saitou Hajime she even bothered to build a
bibliography at=
 her site.  Her speculations are clearly  separated
from the historical fac=
ts (mostly drawn from the work of Shizuko Akama).

you may also use history=
 to help you speculate for example you may
study divorce and marriage in th=
at era and look at the texts available
 
http://www.hajimenokizu.com/forum/=
viewtopic.php?p=3D777#777

alot of things will begin to make sense once you=
 understand the
historical context---the more you read the more your specul=
ation will
change over time---to remain static in your opinion when texts p=
oint
to a different direction will not help you (unless you are writing a
w=
ork of fiction in which case you can write whatever you want).
